page.title: 11Hammonds Garage, Whitfield
page.content: The building of the Dover by-pass has greatly expanded the garage business which started off modestly as a wooden shed over 40 years ago. The garage is open 24 hours a day. It faces Whitfield roundabout where 6 roads converge. Average annual petrol sales of 65,000 gallons per week or 3.5 million gallons a year make it the busiest petrol station in Europe. Site storage capacity is 80,000 gallons maintained by 620 tanker deliveries a year. The self-service petrol and diesel pumps are positioned on 2 forecourts. A computer link from pump to cash till indicates amount of each sale and can reveal how much petrol remains in storage. The garage business has diversed to satisfy consumer demand and includes snack bar and retail facilities for groceries, sweets, toys, medicine, papers and camping gear.
